snippet: An exhibition at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts examines the eerie paintings and drawings of the filmmaker David Lynch.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibition of paintings, drawings and prints by director David Lynch at the Academy of Fine Arts in Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts examines the eerie paintings and drawings of the filmmaker David Lynch.

headline.seo: Exploring David Lynch’s Paintings and Drawings
